name: Hell Rider - Extreme Bike Stunts Free
name_original: Hell Rider - Extreme Bike Stunts Free
description:
*** INTENSE BIKE STUNTS ACTION! ***
*** ALL ITEMS UNLOCKED ***

Take your bike to new extreme levels in this fast paced thrill ride of a stunts game! Get huge air! Do massive tricks! Break your neck trying the riskiest most dangerous stunts a daredevil rider has ever ridden.

* Awesome 3D stunt tracks!
* Massive air time, stunts, crashes and more!
* Game Center Leaderboards.

DOWNLOAD and feel the burn today!
